description: This CSS file defines variables and styles for theming a React application, with light and dark themes, responsive design elements, and styling for various components including headers and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling that centers content and adjusts background and text colors based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including hover animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the application, including layout and color management.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling between light and dark themes.
